issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Problem description

Build/Run on iOS device enabling LiveView.
Looking at the logs, LiveView seems to be running correctly.
However, no modification made is being applied, also after manually building/running again the project, as if the Alloy code wasn't recompiled.

It seems to be intermittent and not always reproducible.
Currently using the attached sample code.

Attaching log
fields.summary: LiveView: Alloy: iOS device: if LiveView is enabled, code is no longer recompiled even building manually
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK 3.1.1.GA
Alloy 1.1.3
LiveView 0.1.24
Appcelerator Studio 3.1.1.201306131423
Node 0.8.22

comments.body:
Hi Federico, could you test against the latest LiveView plugins, which contain LiveView 0.1.27, to see if the problem still occurs?

Thanks.
